PackageOracle.name: DA_SPECIAL_REQUEST_ITEM
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SPECIAL_REQUEST_ITEM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.19.275959000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,special_request_order_id IN NUMBER

,after_item_qty IN NUMBER
,item_action_cd IN VARCHAR2
,package_billing_product_id IN NUMBER

,service_billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,service_billing_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_impact_cd IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business_impact_cd IN VARCHAR2
,impacted_line_of_business_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

);

PROCEDURE del (

,special_request_item_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_special_request_item;

body.name: DA_SPECIAL_REQUEST_ITEM
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SPECIAL_REQUEST_ITEM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.19.288750000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,special_request_order_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,before_item_qty IN NUMBER
,after_item_qty IN NUMBER
,item_action_cd IN VARCHAR2
,package_billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,package_billing_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,service_billing_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_impact_cd IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business_impact_cd IN VARCHAR2
,impacted_line_of_business_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_special_request_item.add(fx), parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || special_request_order_id || '|' || account_id || '|' || before_item_qty || '|' || after_item_qty || '|' || item_action_cd || '|' || package_billing_product_id || '|' || package_billing_product_cd || '|' || service_billing_product_id || '|' || service_billing_product_cd || '|' || account_impact_cd || '|' || line_of_business_impact_cd || '|' || impacted_line_of_business_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_special_request_item a
(
a.special_request_item_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.special_request_order_id
,a.account_id
,a.before_item_qty
,a.after_item_qty
,a.item_action_cd
,a.package_billing_product_id
,a.package_billing_product_cd
,a.service_billing_product_id
,a.service_billing_product_cd
,a.account_impact_cd
,a.line_of_business_impact_cd
,a.impacted_line_of_business_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_special_request_item_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.special_request_order_id
,add.account_id
,add.before_item_qty
,add.after_item_qty
,add.item_action_cd
,add.package_billing_product_id
,add.package_billing_product_cd
,add.service_billing_product_id
,add.service_billing_product_cd
,add.account_impact_cd
,add.line_of_business_impact_cd
,add.impacted_line_of_business_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.special_request_item_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_special_request_item.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,special_request_order_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,before_item_qty IN NUMBER
,after_item_qty IN NUMBER
,item_action_cd IN VARCHAR2
,package_billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,package_billing_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,service_billing_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_impact_cd IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business_impact_cd IN VARCHAR2
,impacted_line_of_business_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_special_request_item.add, parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || special_request_order_id || '|' || account_id || '|' || before_item_qty || '|' || after_item_qty || '|' || item_action_cd || '|' || package_billing_product_id || '|' || package_billing_product_cd || '|' || service_billing_product_id || '|' || service_billing_product_cd || '|' || account_impact_cd || '|' || line_of_business_impact_cd || '|' || impacted_line_of_business_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_special_request_item a
(
a.special_request_item_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.special_request_order_id
,a.account_id
,a.before_item_qty
,a.after_item_qty
,a.item_action_cd
,a.package_billing_product_id
,a.package_billing_product_cd
,a.service_billing_product_id
,a.service_billing_product_cd
,a.account_impact_cd
,a.line_of_business_impact_cd
,a.impacted_line_of_business_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_special_request_item_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.special_request_order_id
,add.account_id
,add.before_item_qty
,add.after_item_qty
,add.item_action_cd
,add.package_billing_product_id
,add.package_billing_product_cd
,add.service_billing_product_id
,add.service_billing_product_cd
,add.account_impact_cd
,add.line_of_business_impact_cd
,add.impacted_line_of_business_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_special_request_item.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,special_request_item_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,special_request_order_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,before_item_qty IN NUMBER
,after_item_qty IN NUMBER
,item_action_cd IN VARCHAR2
,package_billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,package_billing_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,service_billing_product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,account_impact_cd IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business_impact_cd IN VARCHAR2
,impacted_line_of_business_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_special_request_item.add, parms=' || special_request_item_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || special_request_order_id || '|' || account_id || '|' || before_item_qty || '|' || after_item_qty || '|' || item_action_cd || '|' || package_billing_product_id || '|' || package_billing_product_cd || '|' || service_billing_product_id || '|' || service_billing_product_cd || '|' || account_impact_cd || '|' || line_of_business_impact_cd || '|' || impacted_line_of_business_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_special_request_item a
(
a.special_request_item_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.special_request_order_id
,a.account_id
,a.before_item_qty
,a.after_item_qty
,a.item_action_cd
,a.package_billing_product_id
,a.package_billing_product_cd
,a.service_billing_product_id
,a.service_billing_product_cd
,a.account_impact_cd
,a.line_of_business_impact_cd
,a.impacted_line_of_business_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.special_request_item_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.special_request_order_id
,add.account_id
,add.before_item_qty
,add.after_item_qty
,add.item_action_cd
,add.package_billing_product_id
,add.package_billing_product_cd
,add.service_billing_product_id
,add.service_billing_product_cd
,add.account_impact_cd
,add.line_of_business_impact_cd
,add.impacted_line_of_business_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_special_request_item.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,special_request_item_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_special_request_item.del, parms=' || special_request_item_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_special_request_item a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.special_request_item_id = del.special_request_item_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_special_request_item.del');

END del;

END da_special_request_item;
